intro.title: Hello
intro.subtitle: I am Sybil Rondeau, Front-end developer.
intro.paragraph2: Passionate with iron will, I was an autodidact before I took Le Wagon certification in March 2020. I am now in a work training programm about UX Design. I joined the Oniti Team last October 2021.
intro.paragraph4: For over a decade now, I have also been working under the name SybR, as a family documentary photographer. Previously, I had a twelve-year career as an emergency department X-ray tecnichian (working night shifts !).

portfolio.paragraph1: This is a few projects, one during Le Wagon bootcamp, an assigment for DrakkR agency (Nantes), and my personal portfolio in Vue.js - Nuxt.js.
portfolio.paragraph2: What's more, I experiment with Codepen.

portfolio3.title: WSSA
portfolio3.description: I carried out Front-end work on this application that presents the competition results of the Word Slalom Skaters Association. Rankings are displayed with the Datatables Plugin in Ruby on Rails framework.

portfolio2.title: SybR Lab
portfolio2.description: I like clean, smooth websites, where typography and design have an important place. This website is made with Vue.js - Nuxt.js, with Greensock library powering animation, i18n providing internationalization and Vuelidate for the contact form.

portfolio1.title: PhotographR
portfolio1.description: This is a project made in ten days during Le Wagon bootcamp : it is a customer relationship management application designed for photographers. It can be viewed on YouTube, presented by Oph√©lie, project coordinator.

contact.title: Hello !
contact.description:
Are you an established Company, a Startup business, a Web Agency or a Developer in need of a Front-end developer ?
I am available for short and long-term assignments on a freelance basis, as well as being open to offers to join your team !
